Text: Wouldn't play on my xbox360. Anime44 Torrent works for me though...
if you use vuze as your torrent program it has a built in re-encoding suite to make any video you download work on the 360.  that's the solution i use, works like a charm.

@Skymocker, That true? Is it easy to use?

Sound like a right newb haha

Thanks for the upload, anonymous

@steaveatron
http://www.joystiq.com/2009/03/23/vuze-brings-hd-video-streaming-to-xbox-360-and-ps3/

...just simply drag-and-drop the video poised for streaming into Vuze's "Devices" tab and you're set. Vuze will automatically convert file formats if it detects that the original file can't be played on the receiving device. Oh, and the fact that it is completely free should be reason enough to try it out...
